entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of drizzle. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
